message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I think a 60/40 split is more fair, considering I'm the one making the offer this time.  Let's get this done quickly!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 60/40 is too skewed. I'll give you 40% this time, but I want 60% for myself.
Let's meet in the middle.  55/45 is a fair compromise that gives us both a decent share.  We're wasting time with this back and forth!
I'm starting to get worried about the time running out. I'll meet you halfway again, but I think 55/45 is still too generous to you. Let's try 53/47 instead.
We're running out of time!  Let's compromise again - 52/48 is the fairest option to give us both a good amount before the value of the money drops too much.
I'm not willing to give up yet! I'll try to get a better deal. Let's go for 51/49, and we can both get a decent share before the money loses more value.
